java.lang.Object

              org.apache.fop.pdf.PDFFontType0
All Implemented Interfaces:
PDFWritable
public class PDFFontType0
extends PDFFont

Class representing a Type0 font.

Type0 fonts are specified on page 208 and onwards of the PDF 1.3 spec.
